official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of dolls and certain other toy figures.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to revise the tariff treatment of dolls and certain toy figures. Grants duty-free treatment to: (1) stuffed dolls; (2) doll clothing imported separately; (3) certain toy figures of inanimate objects; and (4) skins of dolls and toy figures of animate and inanimate objects. Imposes specified tariffs on dolls that are not stuffed and on certain toy figures of inanimate objects.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of dolls and certain other toy figures.
